casebody.data:
Edwin LEON, Jr.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 26, 2019

Mark Rademacher, assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Laurie N. Feldman, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Edwin Leon, Jr.'s petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 512, 208 A.3d 296 (2019), is denied.
